post.body: hope you have finished "sleep-driving" I worry about you, you know btw presidium goodies arrived today thnx and yum yum hpy xms
just one week off?? ha! amateurs!!
no probs - hope you have a good break, see you in the new year
thanks, it's been a long time comin, this last couple of weeks have been a long hard slog!
you find a sudden and compelling desire to learn more about quality, portfolios and entitlements!! ;-)
you see, you may laugh but truth is always stranger than fiction http://www.zorrothemusical.com/
seen this? http://snaptweet.com/
different channel, same temptation ;-)
looks like you are watching same as us, any guesses who the "big life" star was?
did i do it?....well, not yet but the temptation lingers
wishing everyone a very merry christmas and/or happy holidays :-D
now all sorted, all presents sent to santa, cosying down with wine and chocs and xmas tv
today was last minute scramble for extra present for son after finding special WoW keyboard not compatible - price of being ahead yesterday!
halls decked, houseguest installed, last minute pressie shopping - all done! feeling ahead of the game, what have I forgotten??
ok then - no more work for 2 wks - happy holidays!!!
last day at work before the holidays - starting to feel really xmasy :-))
zorro the musical?? seriously??
google theme changed to flying santa - making effective use of my time??? too right!!
celebrity comes of TV, 10yo son says "I don't like him, his life's too big" -ah bless, great phrase! tho sad he thinks big life is bad thing
annual temptation to hit "delete all" in inbox.... would it matter, would it, would it???
